long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin provides users with an alternate login method that is both efficient and effective, allowing for flawless functioning of websites that require a passcode. The login process just requires one click. Because it does not save any sensitive information, it protects the privacy of its users. In addition, each and every created passcode for the login is time-stamped in order to allow only limited access. This helps to avoid misuse as well as spam.
